extendedInfo.description: Dividet HTML Editor is a tool designed for easy implementation of websites. It is the perfect tool for webmasters that are on the go. We have included many features that makes programming websites very easy, all these grouped into a design that delights the eye.With our app you a webmaster can edit codes like HTML, HTML5, PHP, Javascript, CSS, XML and even plain text.FEATURES:    - Smart and specialized SUGGESTIONS and AUTOCOMPLETE for all types of codes (HTML, PHP, Javascript, CSS, XML)    - Auto-Close tag button for HTML and XML    - Text highlights for all types of codes (HTML, PHP, Javascript, CSS, XML)    - Specialized toolbars for all types of codes (HTML, PHP, Javascript, CSS, XML)    - Undo/Redo feature    - Test tool for your projects    - Tutorials and references for HTML, Javascript, PHPLite version has a limited time for suggestions, testing and some code highlights !!! We hope you enjoy our editor tool app for wich we have made efforts and worked hard.We will come soon with other updates and new features.Developers  - Cococi Alin-Gabriel  - Armanda Daniel-Mihai

reviews.title: Best html editor.
reviews.comment: This is a great app for html editing.keep it up.
reviews.author: Rahul Bhakad

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: Won\'t load HTML files that have already been downloaded on my mobile.
reviews.author: KJ Eilers
